entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:52 PM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:52 PM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 10:52 PM CST Thursday 12 January 2023
